tr.td: Used space on the filesystem (in kilobytes).
Name of the directory where the filesystem is mounted.
Available space on the filesystem (in kilobytes).
Name of the device from which this filesystem is mounted. For example, /dev/sda1.
Number of file nodes on the filesystem.
Free space available on the filesystem (in kilobytes).
Number of free file nodes on the filesystem.
Filesystem mount options. For example, rw,noexec.
Name of the filesystem. For example, ext3.
Total space on the filesystem (in kilobytes).
Internally maintained tuple by sigar. Inaccurate. For example tmpfs is not a ram filesystem. "unknown", "none", "local", "remote", "ram", "cdrom", "swap" (to be deleted)
